title: Professor Green feared catching thrush from a chicken filming new series
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Professor Green feared contracting thrush from a chicken as he swapped the city for the countryside in a brand new celebrity series My Famous Babysitter.

The 35-year-old rapper, real name Stephen Manderson, was challenged to look after three kids in the Cotswolds as their parents took a well-deserved break but also had his hands full when it came to the animals.

‘I had to worm sheep, which obviously doesn’t happen on a council estate in Hackney,’ Stephen explained.



Advertisement

Advertisement

‘We had to get the eggs out of the hen house and I didn’t have a bloody clue. One of the chicken had thrush. I was like, “Get me out of here”.’

Stephen added: ‘I didn’t know chickens could get thrust I didn’t want chicken thrush.’

Professor Green has his work cut out on My Famous Babysitter (Picture: UKTV)

Thrush aka Candidiasis is a mycotic disease of the digestive tract of various avian species, including chickens, turkeys, and quail caused by yeast Candida albicans.

Whitish, thickened patches form inside the crop or on the skin of the vent area of a chicken suffering from candidiasis. In a few cases, sores may develop in the gizzard’s lining.

Thrush isn’t contagious between birds, but several birds living in the same filthy environment or exposed to antibiotics in feed or water can be affected at one time.

Lovely.

My Famous Babysitter kicks off tonight and sees the likes of Stephen, Rachel Riley, Anita Rani and I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! winner Georgia Toffolo experience the reality of 21 st century parenting by taking full responsibility of a family of children.

Aside from the cameras, monitoring their every move are a chaperone and a psychologist.

The celebs face uphill battles with discipline, homework and arguments over bedtime.

Advertisement

Advertisement

At the end of their time in charge they face some honest feedback from the parents and the kids, and it proves to be an emotional experience for everyone involved.

My Famous Babysitter begins tonight at 10pm on W.

description: Professor Green feared catching thrush from a chicken filming new series My Famous Babysitter.
